features: 🌷【Dimensions】 - 2 beautiful matte off-white handmade vases, taller size (W 6.3" X H 8") neck opening 1.3", shorter size (W 5.4" X H 7") neck opening 0.9"

🌷【DESIGN】 - The handcrafted vase is designed with a unique scene of couples cuddling each other, two separate and beautiful vases, The hollow in the middle makes it not only a vase, but also a work of art, and any placement will show a modern atmosphere and geometric aesthetics.

🌷【Texture】 - The white ceramic vase is fired at 1300 degrees, making it a unique work of art, the body of the vase has a vertical grained matte texture, the bottom is polished smooth, the footing is stable, it will not hurt the table top, the entire surface feels comfortable, it can be inserted into your favorite dried flowers, Natural pampas grass, reeds, rabbit tails or a variety of different flowers to decorate your home with flowers, greenery, succulents

🌷【SCENE】 - With its minimalist and modern design, its vase is the perfect centerpiece for all rooms and occasions. You can put it in the living room, bedroom, dining table, conference room, wedding scene, office, party, etc. It can also be a great gift for weddings, housewarmings and all special events

🌷【Service】Because This product is very fragile. If the product is damaged during shipping, we offer a refund or exchange, if you have any questions, please contact us, all issues will be resolved within 24 hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This looks really nice on our table in the hallway. Both are a perfect size, and I love the way it connects. I added some greenery and some flowers looks really nice. It is well made. Something different than just a plain vase. I definitely would recommend this product glad I purchased it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This looks great and packaged really well
reviews.reviewText: This vase just elevated our living room look. It’s feels high end and also was well packaged so it couldn’t crack while in delivery. Happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love my new vase centerpiece. Just what I was looking for. Simple yet elegant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks really nice and expensive for some reason
reviews.reviewText: Came packed nicely. Looks pretty nice looking in person and more expensive then it is, which is great! Took of one star because I don’t love the gritty texture, but impressed overall. I wish this company sold more decor like it! Heads up that you need to put pads under it or it will scratch a table. I put mine on a books so no issues.
